thread.title: ys61

author: ys61
title: ys61
text:
The button "Jetzt bezahlen" works with
Win 10, Win 8.1 : only with IE
Win 7: IE, Firefox, Chrome, Opera
The button "Jetzt bezahlen" do NOT work with:
Win 10, Win 8.1
Firefox, Chrome, Opera
(all browser newest versions)
(perhaps the button works with additional software.. like Java etc. but it should be possible to create this side in this way that the side also works without additional software)
